ygData.messageBody:
My problem with Rolemaster is, its not high fantasy. Heroes don't bleed to
death after being shot by an arrow from soem schlep goblin. We ran into a
some hige warlord, mega evil NPC. Whats our plan to kill him? Launch a
small army of distempered lizards into the castle, one of them will
critical him and kill him...

In any case, I played Gemstone which was based on Rolemaster, its was a fun
Mudd, so the system has merit when you have a computer to crunch the
numbers.
